meanings.definition: To throw or toss something upwards.
meanings.sent1: She upflings the ball into the air.
meanings.sent2: He always upflings his hat when he's happy.
meanings.sent3: The clown upflings the juggling balls with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: The magician upflings the cards, making them disappear into thin air.
meanings.sent5: The child upflings the kite, watching it soar high in the sky.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing or tossing something upwards.
meanings.sent1: The upflings of confetti added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: His upflings of rocks created a small avalanche.
meanings.sent3: The upflings of popcorn at the movie theater made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The upflings of leaves in the autumn wind danced gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The upflings of balloons at the party filled the room with color.
